Text: @Warjah........You must have failed history in school huh?  There has never been a white slave?  Are you stupid?  There have been all kinds of "white" slaves in history, just off the top of my head I can tell you that many of the slaves from Ancient Rome were white.  What do you think all those people were that fought in the games in the coliseum?  Or what about all the people of the mid-evil times when they were conquered or invaded by enemies, what do you think they did with all their prisoners?  They made them slaves!!  Take a history lesson and learn something!!
